name: The Orbs Quest
description:
The Blub Kingdom possesses enchanted lands; a great source of magical energy. 

But not a one who tried to extract it succeeded. In search of this great power, an evil mage called Lord Krull captured the castle and imprisoned the Blubs.

Using his mighty sorcery, he managed to extract that magic into orbs. However, the fragments have spread throughout the kingdom, forcing Krull to send his creatures to collect the orbs.

In the meantime...

A young mage passes through the kingdom and hears a cry for help. Using her magic rod, she chases away a band of creatures attacking a Blub. As the little Blub explains the situation, one of Krull's minions steals the wand.

Now she must to embark on a journey to recover her rod, collect the orbs to stop Lord Krull and save the Blubs and your kingdom.

Features:
+4 areas
+puzzles
+mini-games
+boss fights
+No need RTP.
+Length: 1-2 hours 

For those who want to enjoy The Orbs Quest but are having difficulties in the part of puzzles, see the page puzzles guide and also the final boss guide.

Engine: Rpg Maker Vx Ace

Feel free to leave a comment below.
